item.description:
How is the current economic condition impacting the future of commercial real estate?
htttp://www.ForeclosuresMass.com/mfsubgroup/

What's happening with Cap Rates? Vacancy? Values?

What do you need to know as a buyer?

At our May Multi-Family Sub Group meeting, get the inside track from Lisa Carpenter, a leading commercial broker intimately familiar with the commercial market.

Of note, Lisa will be covering:
* Outlook for 2009
* Vacancy trends - Which areas are doing better?
* Multi-Family foreclosure / auction trends
* Strategies for existing owners vs. prospective owners
* How to determine which deals "make sense"
* Cap Rate trends - and what they mean
* Cash needs for buyers - and what you should know about your credit
* The biggest opportunity for buyers right NOW
* What you as a buyer need to watch out for - now more than ever
* Getting deals done when the bank won't help you

In addition, if you have a multi-family deal that you want to share, make sure to bring along some information. Our Multi-Family Sub Group is a great place to meet other like-minded investors and multi-family real estate professionals.

Make sure to pre-register today to reserve your spot for this live multi-family networking event!
htttp://www.ForeclosuresMass.com/mfsubgroup/

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: MFSG: The Future of Commercial Real Estate
